
{{alias}}( shape, clbk[, thisArg] )
    Returns a filled two-dimensional nested array according to a provided
    callback function.

    The callback function is provided one argument:

    - indices: element indices.

    Parameters
    ----------
    shape: Array<integer>
        Array shape.

    clbk: Function
        Callback function.

    thisArg: any (optional)
        Callback execution context.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array
        Output array.

    Examples
    --------
    > function clbk() { return 1.0; };
    > var out = {{alias}}( [ 1, 3 ], clbk )
    [ [ 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 ] ]

    See Also
    --------
